law.catch_line: Annual reports of agencies holding funds.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 38, effective May 30, 1997. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 382, sec. 13, effective July 15, 1982.

metadata.lrc-note: (5/30/97). KRS 342.440, cited in this statute, was repealed by 1987 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky Acts ch. 1, sec. 72(2), effective January 4, 1988.
